::Worker Drone::

    It let go of it's hold, but not before a small needle=
 came out of it's body, it went into the bots hand (he has it by the body, =
close quarters) and injected nanoprobes that would amplify it's Destron sig=
nature. That way anybots that had a scanner going in a 1 mile radius would =
pick up his signature. Magmatron had because his were intune with Destrons =
signals.
    The Drone scampered away and hid under a rock. It began to bur=
row into the ground so the bot wouldn't find it.
  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: kinger01030@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday,=
 November 19, 2000 9:23 PM
  Subject: Re: A destron for the ages


  The ev=
il destron reacted quickly as the crawler tried to grab his face he 
  grab=
bed it by the front pushing it away from his face . He took his fire 
  las=
er on his wrist and tried to fry off the being tale. 

        eGroups Spon=
sor
